text: [Mo hamcunon ʙa kofiron muhlat medodem] To on goh ki pajomʙaron [az nuzuli azoʙ] ma'jus sudand va [mardum] pindostand, ki ʙa onon duruƣ gufta sudaast. [Dar in hangom] Jorii Mo ʙa suroƣason omad. Pas, har kiro xostem, nacot joft, va[-le] azoʙi saxti Mo az guruhi mucrimon ʙozgardonida namesavad
